name: 迪帕克·阿南德
name_full: 迪帕克·阿南德 Deepak Anand
introduction: Deepak Anand had a passion for films since his early days while at University in Mumbai, India - home to the Indian Film Industry - now known as "Bollywood", which had an influence on him. He now lives in London. After completion of Degrees in Economics and Law, he entered the Aviation Industry and after serving for 35 years, retired holding Senior Management positions in Marketing & Advertising. Post retirement, he re-kindled his passion for the creative field of Acting and soon entered the world of modelling and acting. He has, since had, a reasonable amount of experience both in Modelling and Acting in short and Feature films, Commercials / Music Videos in featured/speaking roles and enjoys facing the camera. Although now 66, he has a playing age around 55. Besides, being an Ethnic Indian, due to his olive skin colour and a large walrus moustache, he has uncharacteristic looks which could suit South Asian, Middle Eastern, Mediterranean or South American character roles. In order to develop himself and enhance his skills, he has successfully completed an Acting course and has been awarded a Diploma in "Acting for the Camera" by the London Academy for Media Film TV, UK in December 2015.
